Good Comments: I prefer this fansubbing, because the others I could find were terrible at timing and their grammar left a lot to be desired.
While in the very end (205-206, 208, 331-332) they were good, for the most part they ranged from mediocre to terrible to horrible in translation quality.
Bad Comments: terrible, terrible subs, full of mistranslations and awkward wording which in an anime like conan can really hinder your understanding of the episode

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Detective Conan Movie 03: The Last Wizard of the Century

Bad Comments: Great subs. Only a few mistakes here and there.
